entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
